entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening then periods of snow and local blowing snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
